Detailed Description

I2C driver implementation for a am57x I2C controller.

============================================================================

The I2C header file should be included in an application as follows:

#include <ti/drv/i2c/I2C.h>
#include <ti/drv/i2c/soc/I2C_soc.h>

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum I2C_Mode_e I2C_Mode

I2C mode.

This enum defines the state of the I2C driver's state-machine. Do not modify. I2C V1 Object

The application must not access any member variables of this structure!

typedef int32_t(* I2C_socCfgIntrPathFxn) (const void *pHwAttrs, bool setIntrPath)

Function to set interrupt path.

This function will configure the interrupt path to the destination CPU using DMSC firmware via sciclient. if setIntrPath is set to TRUE, a path is set, else the interrupt path is released

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum I2C_Mode_e

I2C mode.

This enum defines the state of the I2C driver's state-machine. Do not modify.

enum I2C_operMode_e

I2C operating modes.

Enumerator

Interrupt blocking mode

I2C_OPER_MODE_CALLBACK 

Interrupt callback mode

I2C_OPER_MODE_POLLING 

Polling based blocking mode
